summary.para: Displays a summary of a set of test step runs.
This control is optimized to display individual test run results to the user on demand more quickly than could be done if we had to show the whole report at once.

member.name: M:Gallio.UI.Reports.TestStepRunViewer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a test step run viewer.

member.name: M:Gallio.UI.Reports.TestStepRunViewer.Clear
member.summary: Clears the contents of the report viewer and discards all cached content.

member.name: M:Gallio.UI.Reports.TestStepRunViewer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Gallio.UI.Reports.TestStepRunViewer.Show(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Gallio.Runner.Reports.Schema.TestStepRun})
member.summary: Displays information about a set of test step run.

member.name: M:Gallio.UI.Reports.TestStepRunViewer.Show(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Gallio.Runner.Reports.Schema.TestStepRun},Gallio.Model.Schema.TestModelData)
member.summary: Displays information about a set of test step runs, using additional information from the test model when available.
member.param: The test model data, or null if not available.
